# nexus-toggle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                                                                                                                         | Type                                   | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `attrId`        | `attr-id`        | The unique identifier of the toggle.                                                                                                                                | `string`                               | `undefined` |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | Whether the toggle is disabled.                                                                                                                                     | `boolean`                              | `undefined` |
| `labelActive`   | `label-active`   | Set label to be dispayed on right hand side of toggle.                                                                                                              | `string`                               | `null`      |
| `labelInactive` | `label-inactive` | Set label to be dispayed on left hand side of toggle.                                                                                                               | `string`                               | `null`      |
| `required`      | `required`       | Whether the toggle is required.                                                                                                                                     | `boolean`                              | `undefined` |
| `size`          | `size`           | Set size for the toggle. size variants represented as width x height [ xs = 32px x 16px, sm = 48px x 24px, md = 80px x 40px, lg = 112px x 56px, xl = 128px x 64px ] | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `'md'`      |
| `toggled`       | `toggled`        | Whether the toggle is on or off.                                                                                                                                    | `boolean`                              | `undefined` |
| `type`          | `type`           | Toggle type, switch by default.                                                                                                                                     | `"button" \| "switch"`                 | `'switch'`  |
| `value`         | `value`          | Set the value for toggle based on toggle identifier.                                                                                                                | `string`                               | `''`        |


----------------------------------------------
